path: artifacts/Lil Dragon Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.AntiBotLiquidityGeneratorToken: contracts/Lil Dragon Full Smart Contract Security Audit/AntiBotLiquidityGeneratorToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply()` may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: Owner has various privileges that can impact the contract's behavior.
